textAfterTable: Locations were scored based the 90th percentile of the data points in the data history. Source: ECMWF 40 years reanalysis Bathymetry Transformation Function: Bathymetry Score Depth (meters) 100 0 – 300 80 300 – 600 60 600 – 1,000 40 1,000 – 1,500 20 1,500 or deeper Source: NOAA ETOPO1 Global Relief Bedrock Model   Currents, 90th percentile Transformation Function: Current speed Score Value (m/s) 100 < 0.5 80 0.5 – 0.75 60 0.75 – 1 40 1 – 1.5 20 > 1.5 Source: NOAA Ocean Surface Current Analyses (OSCAR) Wave height, 90th percentile Transformation Function: Wave height Score Value (m) 100 0 – 1 80 1 – 2 60 2 – 3 40 3 – 4 20 4 – 5 1 > 5 The heat map shows the 90th percentile of the monthly averages of significant wave height for the past 40 years.
